name: LD48 - Dikes & Polders
description:
Polder: a piece of low-lying land reclaimed from the sea or a river and protected by dikes, especially in the Netherlands.

Build windmills to drain the sea, allowing for the growing of very valuable tulips!

Instructions:

  • Mouse wheel or right click to rotate tiles
  • Tiles can only be placed on land
  • Windmills drains the water in a 5x5 area and provide a starting point for flowers
  • Flowers must match at least one colour or a windmill
  • Create chains of matching colours longer than 3 to score points
  • Longer chains score more points 
  • New windmills are unlocked by scoring points

Changelog:

  • Fixed a bug where the game incorrectly detects if any more moves can be made, preventing the game from being completed
